description: React component 'QAPanel' which renders a question/answer turn with references in a user interface. The component normalizes nested API responses into readable text and displays references if available.

methods.name: getQuestionText
methods.description: Normalizes various question object structures into plain text.

methods.name: getAnswerText
methods.description: Normalizes various answer object structures into plain text.

methods.name: safeRefTitle
methods.description: Returns a human-readable title for a reference object or string.

methods.name: safeRefText
methods.description: Extracts displayable text from a reference object or string.
